Workflow.Name: TDG Inspections - Detention Notice - HTTP
Workflow.Description: Create one or more actions to happen when records in the Common Data Service portal are selected. To use this flow from Common Data Service, select the record(s) you want to send to the flow, go to the command bar at the top of the screen, select Flows, and choose this flow.

Description.description: Create one or more actions to happen when records in the Common Data Service portal are selected. To use this flow from Common Data Service, select the record(s) you want to send to the flow, go to the command bar at the top of the screen, select Flows, and choose this flow.
